snippet: Yemeni security officials said Saeed al-Shihri died of injuries sustained when a drone targeted him in November.
abstract: Yemen-based branch of Al Qaeda confirms that Said Ali al-Shihri, group’s No. 2 figure and former Guantanamo Bay detainee, was killed in an American drone strike; confirmation is significant because Shihri has twice before been reported dead.
lead_paragraph: Yemeni security officials said Saeed al-Shihri died of injuries sustained when a drone targeted him in November.

headline.main: In Yemen, Qaeda Branch’s No. 2 Is Dead, Group Confirms
headline.print_headline: Yemen: Qaeda Branch’s No. 2 Is Dead, Group Confirms
